pullRequest.title: Allow jobs to use lightweight checkout
pullRequest.bodyText:
Extract most of the code from Pipeline-Build-Test-Any-Platform.groovy
and Build-Any-Platform.groovy into new file Pipeline-Initialize.groovy.
Move remaining functionality into pipeline-functions.groovy,
variables-functions.groovy and build.groovy
This allows the jobs to be configured to use lightweight
checkout will will reduce the load on master.
The side effect is the remaining code in Pipeline-Initialize.groovy
will not be testable via PR builds.
The remainder of the pipeline code can still be pulled from
any passed repo/branch/ref. Which will allow PR builds
to continue testing pipeline changes including defaults.yml.

[skip ci]
Related #8252
Signed-off-by: Adam Brousseau adam.brousseau88@gmail.com

beforeCommit.message:
Allow jobs to use lightweight checkout

- Extract most of the code from Pipeline-Build-Test-All.groovy
  and Pipeline-Build-Test-Any-Platform.groovy into new files
  PBTAll.groovy and PBTAny.groovy respectively.
- This allows the jobs to be configured to use lightweight
  checkout will will reduce the load on master.
- The side effect is the remaining code in these files will
  not be testable via PR builds.
- The remainder of the pipeline code can still be pulled from
  whatever repo/branch/ref is passed. Which will allow PR builds
  to continue testing pipeline changes including defaults.yml.
- This is a somewhat quick and dirty test. We should revisit
  these changes and refactor as needed so we don't have so many
  files.

[skip ci]
Related #8252
Signed-off-by: Adam Brousseau <adam.brousseau88@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: Hard-coded personal fork, please remove (set in Job template)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1261,6 +1283,8 @@ def create_job(JOB_NAME, SDK_VERSION, SPEC, downstreamJobType, id){
     params.put('VENDOR_CREDENTIALS_ID_DEFAULT', VENDOR_CREDENTIALS_ID_DEFAULT)
     params.put('jobType', downstreamJobType)
     params.put('DISCARDER_NUM_BUILDS', DISCARDER_NUM_BUILDS)
+    params.put('SCM_REPO', 'https://github.com/Adambrousseau/openj9.git')

nodes.bodyText:
pipeline-functions.groovy is loaded twice: here as buildFile and at L203: pipelineFunctions = load 'buildenv/jenkins/common/pipeline-functions.groovy'
Could use: buildFile = pipelineFunctions

This script loads pipeline-functions.groovy multiple times:
variables-functions.groovy loads pipeline-functions.groovy (twice: see L203, L779)
build.groovy also loads pipeline-functions.groovy.
Some reformatting might be required in order to load the file only once. Could be done in a different PR.

commit.message:
Allow jobs to use lightweight checkout

- Extract most of the code from Pipeline-Build-Test-Any-Platform.groovy
  and Build-Any-Platform.groovy into new file Pipeline-Initialize.groovy.
- Move remaining functionality into pipeline-functions.groovy,
  variables-functions.groovy and build.groovy
- This allows the jobs to be configured to use lightweight
  checkout will will reduce the load on master.
- The side effect is the remaining code in Pipeline-Initialize.groovy
  will not be testable via PR builds.
- The remainder of the pipeline code can still be pulled from
  any passed repo/branch/ref. Which will allow PR builds
  to continue testing pipeline changes including defaults.yml.

[skip ci]
Related #8252
Signed-off-by: Adam Brousseau <adam.brousseau88@gmail.com>
